t = int(input())
for _ in range(t):
    (n, x, s) = map(int, input().split())
    l = [0] * n
    l[x - 1] = 'G'
    for i in range(s):
        (a, b) = map(int, input().split())
        (l[a - 1], l[b - 1]) = (l[b - 1], l[a - 1])
    print(l.index('G') + 1)

for i in range(int(input())):
    (n, x, s) = map(int, input().split())
    list1 = [0 for j in range(n)]
    list1[x - 1] = 1
    for j in range(s):
        (a, b) = map(int, input().split())
        (list1[a - 1], list1[b - 1]) = (list1[b - 1], list1[a - 1])
    print(list1.index(1) + 1)

for i in range(int(input())):
    (n, x, s) = map(int, input().split())
    l = []
    for i in range(n):
        l.append(0)
    l[x - 1] = 1
    for i in range(s):
        (a, b) = map(int, input().split())
        (l[a - 1], l[b - 1]) = (l[b - 1], l[a - 1])
    f = l.index(1)
    print(f + 1)

for i in range(int(input())):
    (n, x, s) = map(int, input().split())
    ls = [0 for i in range(n)]
    ls[x - 1] = 1
    for i in range(s):
        (a, b) = map(int, input().split())
        (ls[a - 1], ls[b - 1]) = (ls[b - 1], ls[a - 1])
    print(ls.index(1) + 1)
